#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

= Main libraries/software =

There are two libraries used: 

1. hammer.js - Provides multitouch support
https://github.com/EightMedia/hammer.js/blob/master/LICENSE
No restrictions

2. TinyBox   - Modal window script for help
http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/us/
Only need to provide attribution. Can be used in commercial works.

= Code snippets =
Any code snippets have a comment with the link in which they originated, although they are public domain and free to use by the author if I used it in EZ Access.
